Visiting Gabrielle Giffords in the hospital Wednesday, Kirsten Gillibrand stroked Gabrielle Giffords ' hand and responded with amazement as she saw her wounded colleague open her eyes. This is a major leap forward, Gabrielle Giffords ' neurosurgeon, Dr. Michael Lemole, said Thursday about the scene Kirsten Gillibrand witnessed Wednesday." This is a major milestone for her, and we're hoping that she crosses through many more."

They are more keen to get a big US star like Katy Perry or Rihanna on the panel- someone who will bring credibility to the show and who is already popular in the US.
